name: HAQ Tabed Slider
author: Husain Ahmed

sections.description:
Allows you to add fully customizable, responsive. This plugin creates an image slide in your theme. Build beautiful image slider, You can upload/delete images via the admin panel,
Every slide can also add Title and Description. Use shortcode [tabed_slider id=”123″] for page, post, widget etc.

Rate This Plugin:

Please rate HAQ Slider Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Upload haq-tabed-slider.zip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Shortcode show every post according to post ID.
  4. Use the provided shortcodes [tabed_slider id=”123″] anywhere on your website.

Just create a normal WordPress page, and use the following shortcodes:

  • For slider: [tabed_slider id="123"]
sections.faq:
Question: How do I add the slider to my site?
Answer: You can add your slider by shortcode on page, post or widget text or PHP shortcode.

Question: Any affect on other Files?
Answer: This will work only for Slider not for other file or function.
